fields.postText: This is an offer to get £6.00 of Pamper's Nappy packs. You need to visit  https://www.pampers.co.uk/coupons-offers/pampers-pants  and use coupon "NEWPANTS6OFF"

fields.postTitle: Anyone else having issues with employers not agreeing?
fields.postText: My current employer really doesn't want me to work from home.

fields.postTitle: New baby and new remote WFH Job
fields.postText: Hey everyone, I'm trying to juggle a full-time remote job while preparing for our new arrival. Some days, it feels like I'm in a constant race against time. How are you all managing work tasks alongside baby prep and eventual parenting duties? Any practical tips or routines that work for you?

fields.postTitle: Need help. The lack of sleep is killing me.
fields.postText: Hi everyone, I'm really in need of advice here! My little one just won't settle down for sleep, and it's affecting both my work and my sanity. Has anyone found any techniques or routines that have worked wonders for getting their baby to sleep more soundly? Appreciate all your tips and tricks!

My boy is just about to move from size one to size two nappies. Because of this we don't really want to spend the money on another pack. Do you know anywhere that i can get some for free or a very reduced cost. Much appriciated.
